metadata.name: avm/ptn/network/private-link-private-dns-zones
metadata.description: Private Link Private DNS Zones
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
An AVM-aligned type for a lock.
Optional. Azure region where the each of the Private Link Private DNS Zones created will be deployed, default to Resource Group location if not specified.
Optional. The lock settings for the Private Link Private DNS Zones created.
Optional. Tags of the Private Link Private DNS Zones created.

Optional. An array of Private Link Private DNS Zones to create. Each item must be a valid DNS zone name.

**NOTE:**

- Private Link Private DNS Zones that have `{{regionCode}}` in the name will be replaced with the Geo Code of the Region you specified in the `location` parameter, if available, as documented [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/private-link/private-endpoint-dns#:~:text=Note-,In%20the%20above%20text%2C%20%7BregionCode%7D%20refers%20to%20the%20region%20code%20(for%20example%2C%20eus%20for%20East%20US%20and%20ne%20for%20North%20Europe).%20Refer%20to%20the%20following%20lists%20for%20regions%20codes%3A,-All%20public%20clouds).
  - e.g. If `UK South` or `uksouth` was specified as the region in the `location` parameter, `{{regionCode}}` would be replaced with `uks` in the Private DNS Zone name.
- Private Link Private DNS Zones that have `{{regionName}}` in the name will be replaced with the short name of the Region you specified in the `location` parameter, if available, as documented [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/private-link/private-endpoint-dns).
  - e.g. If `UK South` or `uksouth` was specified as the region in the `location` parameter, `{{regionName}}` would be replaced with `uksouth` in the Private DNS Zone name.

**IMPORTANT:**

The folowing Private Link Private DNS Zones have been removed from the default value for this parameter as they require additional placeholders to be replaced that will only be known by the caller of the module at runtime and cannot be determined by the module itself. If you have a requirement to create these Private Link Private DNS Zones, you must provide the full list of Private Link Private DNS Zones to create as an array in the `privateLinkPrivateDnsZones` parameter, using the default value as a reference. The list of Private Link Private DNS Zones that have been removed are:

- `{subzone}.privatelink.{regionName}.azmk8s.io`
- `privatelink.{dnsPrefix}.database.windows.net`
- `privatelink.{partitionId}.azurestaticapps.net`

We have also removed the following Private Link Private DNS Zones from the default value for this parameter as they should only be created and used with in specific scenarios:

- `privatelink.azure.com`.
Optional. An array of Virtual Network Resource IDs to link to the Private Link Private DNS Zones. Each item must be a valid Virtual Network Resource ID.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.

metadata.name: Private DNS Zones
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private DNS zone.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The IPv4 address of this A record.
Optional. The list of A records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The IPv6 address of this AAAA record.
Optional. The list of AAAA records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The canonical name of the CNAME record.
Optional. The CNAME record in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The domain name of the mail host for this MX record.
Required. The preference value for this MX record.
Optional. The list of MX records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The PTR target domain name for this PTR record.
Optional. The list of PTR records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The email contact for this SOA record.
Required. The expire time for this SOA record.
Required. The domain name of the authoritative name server for this SOA record.
Required. The minimum value for this SOA record. By convention this is used to determine the negative caching duration.
Required. The refresh value for this SOA record.
Required. The retry time for this SOA record.
Required. The serial number for this SOA record.
Optional. The SOA record in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The priority value for this SRV record.
Required. The weight value for this SRV record.
Required. The port value for this SRV record.
Required. The target domain name for this SRV record.
Optional. The list of SRV records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The text value of this TXT record.
Optional. The list of TXT records in the record set.
Optional. The resource name.
Required. The resource ID of the virtual network to link.
Optional. The Azure Region where the resource lives.
Optional. Is auto-registration of virtual machine records in the virtual network in the Private DNS zone enabled?.
Optional. Resource tags.
Required. Private DNS zone name.
Optional. Array of A records.
Optional. Array of AAAA records.
Optional. Array of CNAME records.
Optional. Array of MX records.
Optional. Array of PTR records.
Optional. Array of SOA records.
Optional. Array of SRV records.
Optional. Array of TXT records.

Optional. Array of custom objects describing vNet links of the DNS zone. Each object should contain properties 'virtualNetworkResourceId' and 'registrationEnabled'. The 'vnetResourceId' is a resource ID of a vNet to link, 'registrationEnabled' (bool) enables automatic DNS registration in the zone for the linked vNet.
Optional. The location of the PrivateDNSZone. Should be global.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Private DNS Zone A record
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private DNS Zone A record.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Conditional. The name of the parent Private DNS zone. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. The name of the A record.
Optional. The list of A records in the record set.
Optional. The metadata attached to the record set.
Optional. The TTL (time-to-live) of the records in the record set.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
The name of the deployed A record.
The resource ID of the deployed A record.
The resource group of the deployed A record.

metadata.name: Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.
Conditional. The name of the parent Private DNS zone. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The name of the virtual network link.
Optional. The location of the PrivateDNSZone. Should be global.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Is auto-registration of virtual machine records in the virtual network in the Private DNS zone enabled?.
Required. Link to another virtual network resource ID.
The name of the deployed virtual network link.
The resource ID of the deployed virtual network link.
The resource group of the deployed virtual network link.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The resource group the private DNS zone was deployed into.
The name of the private DNS zone.
The resource ID of the private DNS zone.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The final array of objects of private link private DNS zones to link to virtual networks including the region name replacements as required.
The resource ID of the resource group that the Private DNS Zones are deployed into.
